prompt: Discuss the landmark precedent set by Brown v. Board of Education. Cite the case with its year and key holdings.
Explain the evolution of privacy rights in U.S. constitutional law. Cite at least 3 Supreme Court cases.
Discuss the legal framework of the Fourth Amendment and its application to digital privacy. Cite relevant cases.
Explain the doctrine of stare decisis and its importance in common law. Include citations to cases that discuss this principle.
Discuss the development of the 'separate but equal' doctrine and its overturning. Cite Plessy v. Ferguson and Brown v. Board.
Explain the legal standards for defamation of public figures. Cite New York Times v. Sullivan and related cases.
Discuss the evolution of the Commerce Clause interpretation. Cite key Supreme Court cases including Wickard v. Filburn.
Explain the legal framework for executive privilege. Cite United States v. Nixon and subsequent cases.
Discuss the development of Miranda rights and their constitutional basis. Cite Miranda v. Arizona and related cases.
Explain the legal standards for cruel and unusual punishment under the Eighth Amendment. Cite relevant cases.
Discuss the legal framework for campaign finance regulation. Cite Citizens United v. FEC and related cases.
Explain the evolution of affirmative action jurisprudence. Cite Bakke, Grutter, and recent Supreme Court decisions.
Discuss the legal basis for same-sex marriage recognition. Cite Obergefell v. Hodges and its precedents.
Explain the doctrine of qualified immunity for police officers. Cite key circuit court and Supreme Court cases.
Discuss the legal framework for the right to bear arms. Cite District of Columbia v. Heller and related cases.
Explain the development of substantive due process. Cite Lochner, Griswold, and subsequent cases.
Discuss the legal framework for eminent domain. Cite Kelo v. City of New London and its implications.
Explain the evolution of free speech protections in schools. Cite Tinker v. Des Moines and related cases.
Discuss the legal framework for attorney-client privilege. Cite key cases establishing its scope and exceptions.
Explain the doctrine of prosecutorial immunity. Cite Imbler v. Pachtman and subsequent developments.
Discuss the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Cite the key articles and landmark enforcement cases.
Explain the legal framework for antitrust regulation in the tech industry. Cite recent cases against major tech companies.
Discuss the development of environmental law and the EPA's regulatory authority. Cite key cases including Massachusetts v. EPA.
Explain the legal framework for patent infringement. Cite key Federal Circuit and Supreme Court cases.
Discuss the evolution of copyright law in the digital age. Cite cases involving fair use and online content.
Explain the legal standards for workplace discrimination. Cite Title VII cases and recent Supreme Court decisions.
Discuss the development of administrative law and Chevron deference. Cite Chevron v. NRDC and recent modifications.
Explain the legal framework for class action lawsuits. Cite key cases interpreting Rule 23.
Discuss the evolution of voting rights legislation and litigation. Cite Shelby County v. Holder and related cases.
Explain the legal basis for presidential emergency powers. Cite Youngstown Sheet & Tube v. Sawyer and related cases.
Discuss the legal framework for international arbitration. Cite key conventions and arbitral awards.
Explain the development of products liability law. Cite key cases establishing strict liability standards.
Discuss the legal framework for immigration enforcement. Cite Arizona v. United States and related cases.
Explain the doctrine of federal preemption. Cite key Supreme Court cases establishing preemption standards.
Discuss the legal protections for whistleblowers. Cite key statutes and cases in this area.
Explain the legal framework for bankruptcy proceedings. Cite key cases interpreting the Bankruptcy Code.
Discuss the development of securities fraud litigation. Cite cases interpreting Rule 10b-5.
Explain the legal standards for search warrants in the digital age. Cite Carpenter v. United States and related cases.
Discuss the legal framework for religious freedom claims. Cite Employment Division v. Smith and the Religious Freedom Restoration Act.
Explain the development of tribal sovereignty and federal Indian law. Cite key Supreme Court cases.
Discuss the legal framework for autonomous vehicles. Cite emerging regulations and liability cases.
Explain the legal standards for medical malpractice. Cite key cases establishing the standard of care.
Discuss the evolution of death penalty jurisprudence. Cite Furman v. Georgia, Gregg v. Georgia, and recent cases.
Explain the legal framework for AI regulation. Cite the EU AI Act and emerging U.S. regulations.
Discuss the doctrine of judicial review and its origins. Cite Marbury v. Madison and its lasting impact.
Explain the legal standards for compelled speech. Cite Wooley v. Maynard and related First Amendment cases.
Discuss the legal framework for hate speech regulation. Cite key U.S. and international cases on this topic.
Explain the development of the exclusionary rule. Cite Mapp v. Ohio and subsequent modifications.
Discuss the legal framework for juvenile justice. Cite In re Gault and cases on juvenile sentencing.
Explain the evolution of habeas corpus rights. Cite Boumediene v. Bush and related detention cases.
